constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 133 (Thursday, July 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CHU:
H.R. 4803.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Art. 1, Sec. 8 ``The Congress shall have Power To lay and
collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises, to pay the Debts
and provide for the common Defense and general Welfare of the
United States.''
[Page H4294]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Acupuncture for Our Seniors Act of 2021
